scripts.build:css: cross-env mkdir dist-css && npx lessc ./src/css/styles.less > ./dist-css/styles.css && cross-env cp ./dist-css/styles.css ./dist-css/styles.less
scripts.build:docs: rimraf -rf docs && typedoc --out docs --name IIIFAVComponent --theme default --ignoreCompilerErrors --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata --target ES6 --moduleResolution node --preserveConstEnums --stripInternal --suppressExcessPropertyErrors --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --module commonjs src/ && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:esmodule && npm run build:umd && npm run build:var && npm run build:types
scripts.clean: rimraf -rf dist-css dist-umd dist-commonjs dist-esmodule dist-var types
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
